title: Naked Hero 3
content:
Hey all, i just wanted to share my favourite Flash game with you all. I think its very funny and addicting [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

Oh and by the way, theres no nudity or anything, so don't worry.

I've finished the game, and my top score is 41, and i made the TOP 15 online.

Anyway, tell me what you guys think, im interested in your responces. Since your all new ill help you out a bit...

* You only use the mouse
* If you get a red cross like this [X] (only in hard & veryhard) then it means you either pressed the mouse to early or too late, basically you gotta react just in time. Look for the !!!

[url=http://www.2flashgames.com/f/f-569.htm]Play Naked Hero 3[/url]---------
[img]http://img250.echo.cx/img250/9885/comicstrip9vf.gif[/img]
